long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We have an endless library of educational video content, but right now it's designed for entertainment. As self-taught students who rely on YouTube to learn, we decided to change that.
ScholarMode is the first educational platform designed for self-taught individuals, it's the same  YouTube you know and love but now you get to structure your own learning and sidestep the YT vortex. 
We've created a voted discussion section next to every video, so everyone gets to see the best questions and answers by voting ~ kinda like a mini-reddit for self-taught students & creators.

Welcome to ScholarMode ðŸŽ“

note: The extension is currently in Beta and we are constantly improving it, if you have any feedback for bug-reports or feature-requests we'd love to keep making this platform better ðŸ™‚

Send us a quick request here: [scholarmode.com/#bug-report](http://scholarmode.com/#bug-report)
or email us at: [info@scholarmode.com](mailto:info@scholarmode.com)

Have fun learning!
